description:
The Open Source Initiative (OSI) has unveiled a definition framework to evaluate whether AI systems can be classified as open-source. The announcement of the first Open Source AI Definition (OSAID) was made at All Things Open and marks the culmination of a comprehensive global effort spanning multiple years of research, international workshops, and a year-long... Read more »

The post Industry leaders back open-source AI definition appeared first on AI News.
title: Industry leaders back open-source AI definition
